Fellowship of the Ring

This tutorial is currently a work-in-progress and you will encounter bugs on creating heroes but you can actually complete it by editing and deleting duplicates and hitting refresh; although that shouldn't be part of the challenge! I'll update this note when I believe it to be bug-free and open for further testing.

It's designed as a sandbox to explore how MarionetteJS ItemView and CollectionView work together. Be sure to check out the main tutorials page.
